message: I think it's fair to start with a 90/10 split. I'm sure we can find a solution that works for both of us.
I think a 60/40 split is a fair starting point. It allows us both to get a good share of the money, and leaves room for negotiation in later rounds.
I'm willing to compromise, but a 70/30 split is the best I can offer at this point. We both lose money with each passing round, so let's find a solution before the value drops too much further.
Let's split the money evenly.  We've both had our chances to propose, and the value keeps dropping.  A 50/50 split is the fairest way to go at this point.
